scripts.all-chrome: cypress run --config-file cypress.config.js --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/finishedGame.cy.js, cypress/e2e/finishedGame.cy.js
scripts.all-firefox: cypress run --config-file cypress.config.js --browser firefox --spec cypress/e2e/inputValidation.cy.js, cypress/e2e/finishedGame.cy.js
